submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList


class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        res = -1
        sl_add = SortedList()
        sl_dec = SortedList()
        for x, y in points:
            sl_add.add(x + y)
            sl_dec.add(x - y)
        for x, y in points:
            a = x + y
            sl_add.remove(a)
            b = x - y
            sl_dec.remove(b)
            m = max(sl_add[-1] - sl_add[0], sl_dec[-1] - sl_dec[0], )
            if res == -1 or m < res:
                res = m
            sl_add.add(a)
            sl_dec.add(b)
        return res
